title: Supply Drop Alpha
description: The ballistae are too heavy to carry through the streets. You must escort an aerial drop utilizing the broken Sky-Tram lines suspended over the city.

turns.narrative: You are riding the flatbed Sky-Tram as it slowly ferries the ballistae toward the West Gate. A flock of corrupted Fliers (bat-like Scourge) attacks.
turns.consequence_a: You shred the flock efficiently from a distance. The ballistae take no damage.
turns.choice_b: Fight them in melee as they land on the tram
turns.consequence_b: A dangerous brawl on a moving platform. One of the Fliers damages a ballista aiming gear before you kill it.

turns.narrative: The Tram approaches a broken section of track. The engineer needs 3 minutes to bypass the safety relays and jump the gap using the emergency thrusters.
turns.choice_a: Manually hotwire the engine to give him more power
turns.consequence_a: The engine roars. The tram leaps the gap perfectly, landing safely on the other side.
turns.choice_b: Defend him from a second wave of Fliers
turns.consequence_b: You keep the skies clear. The jump is bumpy and almost fails, but you make it.

tram_perfect.description: You delivered the ballistae in perfect condition.

tram_damaged.description: The ballistae were delivered, but require minor repairs.

conclusion: You delivered the ballistae in perfect condition.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
